Detailed Description

IPU WUGEN related APIs.

This file contains the APIs for configuring IPU_WUGEN

Function Documentation

void IPU_WUGEN_Disable ( uint16_t  intrNum)

This API disables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt.

Parameters
intrNum- Interrupt number
Returns
None.
void IPU_WUGEN_DisableAll ( void  )

Disables all wakeup events for CPU.

Parameters
None
Returns
None
void IPU_WUGEN_Enable ( uint16_t  intrNum)

This API enables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt.

Parameters
intrNum- Interrupt number
Returns
None.
void IPU_WUGEN_Init ( void  )

Address offset per register.

This API is used to initialize MPU_WUGEN. All wakeup events will be disabled after initialization.

void IPU_WUGEN_Interrupt_Lookup ( void  )

Configure wakeup events by looking up the CPU0 interrupt settings.

Parameters
None
Returns
